overview: Ismail dismisses his wife Amal, leaving her alone to cope with the hardships of life with her daughter Salwa. The doctor treats Assem, who treats her daughter, and discovers Amal's outstanding talent for singing, helping her to find work to exploit her artistic talent, but the problem is that her divorce is still Pursues them and does not want to leave them for the way they are.
title: منيت شبابى
